messages.content: You are a helpful assistant designed to output JSON.

Analyze the following transcript. For the analysis, Find the words between commands like insert, input, embed, enter, fill, etc and fullstop in a sentence. Replace the command and the spaces after it with `//` 'Clinical History: Abdominal pain and left lower quadrant pain. 100 mL of Omnipaque 350 IVcontrast was administered. Comparison: 12/13/2023. There is minimal bibasilar atelectasis. There are multiple splenic calcifications consistent with remote granulomatous disease. There are subcentimeter hypodensities in the bilateral kidneys, which are too small to characterize, but statistically represent renal cysts. There is a 3.5x2.5 cm hemangioma within the liver, which is benign and incidental. Insert diverticulitis moderate. There is moderate pericolonic inflammatory stranding. Moderate diverticulosis is present in the sigmoid and descending colon.'

function_call.name: Analyze_transcipt
function_call.arguments: {"modified_text":"Clinical History: Abdominal pain and left lower quadrant pain. 100 mL of Omnipaque 350 IVcontrast was administered. Comparison: 12/13/2023. There is minimal bibasilar atelectasis. There are multiple splenic calcifications consistent with remote granulomatous disease. There are subcentimeter hypodensities in the bilateral kidneys, which are too small to characterize, but statistically represent renal cysts. There is a 3.5x2.5 cm hemangioma within the liver, which is benign and incidental. //diverticulitis moderate. There is moderate pericolonic inflammatory stranding. Moderate diverticulosis is present in the sigmoid and descending colon."}

messages.content: Analyze the following transcript: 'SYMPHYSIS / SI JOINTS: The bony pelvis is intact including the SI joints and symphysis pubis. Insert old head mild. Embed click Hallux valgus moderate. With respect to the T2 mapping study, sequential coronal and sagittal images obtained with this technique. Fill Bowel decompressed. That was done along with graded color image analysis as well as corresponding graphing, do not reveal significant derangement or elevation of the T2 relaxation times that would indicate the presence of early chondral degeneration and collagen fiber breakdown in this patient at this time.'

function_call.name: Analyze_transcipt
function_call.arguments: {"modified_text":"SYMPHYSIS / SI JOINTS: The bony pelvis is intact including the SI joints and symphysis pubis. // old head mild. // click Hallux valgus moderate. With respect to the T2 mapping study, sequential coronal and sagittal images obtained with this technique. // Bowel decompressed. That was done along with graded color image analysis as well as corresponding graphing, do not reveal significant derangement or elevation of the T2 relaxation times that would indicate the presence of early chondral degeneration and collagen fiber breakdown in this patient at this time."}
